<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get an invitation link"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/portal/users/invite/{employeeType}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns an invitation link for joining the portal.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"employeeType","in":"path","description":"Employee type (All, RoomAdmin, User, DocSpaceAdmin)","required":true,"schema":{"oneOf":[{"enum":["All","RoomAdmin","Guest","DocSpaceAdmin","User"],"type":"string","description":"[All - All, RoomAdmin - Room admin, Guest - Guest, DocSpaceAdmin - DocSpace admin, User - User]","example":"All"},{"enum":[0,1,2,3,4],"type":"integer","description":"[0 - All, 1 - Room admin, 2 - Guest, 3 - DocSpace admin, 4 - User]","example":0}],"title":"ASC.Core.Users.EmployeeType"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Invitation link","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
